Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated

October 31, 2022
DarkTortoise23
While this version of Robbie is pretty good, especially as a swarm killer, I think equipping a sword or some other equipment to him would help a lot. Not only does giving him blades help with his fairly average single target damage(making that exploit *much* scarier), but some of the secondary effects can help him do what he already was doing, but better. Out of the modern equipment off the top of my head, I think USAgent's/cap's shields, Warlock sword, pogg-ur-pogg, light of galador, or sword of might are all fantastic things to equip him with, warlock most of all due to the fantastic synergy between plasticity and poison. Theres also of course the soulsword, but what mystics TA character isnt a mile better with the soulsword?
